root: ^A homeless man runs up to me with both hands behind his back and tells me to pick a hand.

res1: ^He holds out his left hand and has $20 in it that he gives to me and runs off.
^This was so weird. A homeless person gave ME money. Before I could say anything he ran off. An just left me with $20. But I have to say, it put a good start to my day.
res2: ^He holds out his right hand and has a small book philosopher's quotes. He gives it to me and runs off.

^This was so weird. The homeless guy gave me this book and then ran away before I could say anything. So weird! But I actually started reading through the book later that night and there is a lot of insightful stuff in there.
res3: ^The homeless man gets mad and swings a BOOK at my face and knocks me onto the ground.

^Apparently, in one hand the homeless man had a book and he swung it right at my face, hit me in the eye and knocked me onto the ground. Now, I have a black eye and a bloody nose. What would have happened if I picked that hand?
